title: I can't update my game
body: I can't update the game in my PC and MAC. When I open it, it keep saying unspecific error please check the log. What the heck happens here. It's been two days.    And how can I UPDATE A PHOTO.

replies.body:
The unspecified error is a patching problem, and can be caused by a number of potential problems. We've consolidated the most common solutions for this issue inside our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues). I definitely recommend trying all of the steps included.

Let me know if you continue to have issues patching.
I tried every methods in that guide. The problem is still there. I even repaired my external hard drive thinking maybe some bad sector there but none of the solutions work.
Are you running League from an external hard drive?

Since you're still having problems, I'd like to have you reach out to our tech team with a set of [Hextech Repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) logs. Run the toolkit to gather a zipped log file, then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) submission.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Maybe you can tell me how to upload a photo or zip file? I can send you the logs and you guys can see what happens. This experience really sucks. I called my engineer friend yesterday tried to fix it but he can't do anything about it...
And wired thing is I can't even delete the file.  It says error 0x80070091. And I tried what microsoft says to repair it. But THAT IS NOT WORKING.
I deleted the old one and download a new one it still happens
That sucks T.T  .     I have to go to a net cafe to play.
